short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: send to PicMonkey screenshots and auto-save to WordPress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Submit screenshots to PicMonkey.
Auto-save the edited image to WordPress.


PicMonkey
  http://www.picmonkey.com/


-----------------------------
how to install
-----------------------------
[1] install WordPress plugin

  1. download plugin file
      https://raw.github.com/temog/wp-picmonkey/master/wp-picmonkey/wp-picmonkey.php

  2. create plugin directory
      mkdir wordpress directory/wp-content/plugins/wp-picmonkey

  3. upload plugin file
      wordpress directory/wp-content/plugins/wp-picmonkey/wp-picmonkey.php

  4. enable plugin in management page(http://your domain/wp-admin/plugins.php

[2] install this chrome extension

  Save the settings page api key(Picnik api key). 
  Please contact the api@picmonkey.com If you do not have a Picnik API key.
